"Photoflies":
"I did it! I got my paper officially accepted by
the academy! Now I can enroll and begin my journey
toward becoming a professional meteorologist for
ARKS! I'm going to dedicate myself to my work
even more now. Speaking of which, it's been my
dream to explain the mysterious little lights that
seem to dance through the air over the Cauldron.
It's a rather rare occurrence, but could you go try to
observe it for me?"

"やりましたよ！
僕の論文が正式に採用されました！
晴れてアカデミーへの入学も許可されて
一端の気象予報官になりました！
ますます気象観察に身が入ります！
ずっと気になっていた、火山洞窟で
稀に光が舞う謎の現象を解明するのが
僕の夢なんです！
また観察をお願いできますよね？"
